inn1.comm: Ishant Sharma sends down the first ball, a slower one on Gayle's pads, Gayle defends awkwardly towards the covers

and the danger man Gayle is gone! great start by Ishant, back of a length delivery angling across Gayle, who prods at it off the front foot, he's not moved across enough to cover the movement, gets a thick outside edge which gives Dhoni a simple catch
he leaves his first delivery well alone, it was about a foot outside offstump
this is a bit shorter and closer to off, Sarwan gets onto the backfoot and slaps it towards third man to get off the mark
first ball for Morton, in the channel outside off, Morton defends it towards gully
a little wider, Morton tries to crack it through the covers off the backfoot, mistimed but it's in the gap so he gets a couple of runs
starts off with a full swinging delivery, comes into Sarwan who inside-edges the ball onto his pads, it then rolls towards covers, and the Windies pinch a quick single
a lot wider this time from Nehra, mistimes it towards mid-off
a fuller delivery from Nehra, Morton hammers it straight back at the bowler, Nehra gets a hand on it to take the pace off , and the ball dribbles towards mid-off
good length this time from Nehra, pitching just outside off and straightening, textbook forward defence from Morton
on Morton's pads this time, nudges towards midwicket, straight towards the fielder

reverts to the outside off line, Morton gets on the backfoot and looks to cut, the ball is a bit lower than he expected, a thick inside-edge results, which bounces near the wicket and goes towards gully
Ishant draws Sarwan onto the front foot, pitching on a length on off, Sarwan pushes it towards cover and thinks of a single before decides against it
a touch shorter from Ishant, similar line, Sarwan defends off the backfoot, good bounce on that delivery
on a length, on middle and leg, easy pickings for Sarwan, turns it wide of fine leg for a couple
fullish ball from Ishant, no room for Sarwan to work with, a bit slower as well, Sarwan defends towards the off side
drags back the length a bit, just outside off, Sarwan stands tall and carves it towards third man for a single
Ishant ends a fine over, in the corridor outside off, Morton lifts his bat high and leaves it through to the keeper
Nehra also feeds Sarwan with a back-of-length ball outside off, Sarwan works it away to third man with the angle for a single
this one jags into Morton, he had to adjust late to defend it to the leg side
a bit of width for Morton and he drives it off the backfoot past the covers, it's a wet outfield so the ball doesn't go all the way to the boundary but they get three
way down the leg side, and Nehra will have to re-bowl that one
short of length on offstump this time, Sarwan again looks to glide it towards third man, but doesn't manage to beat the man at  backward point
similar delivery from Nehra, this time Sarwan decides against offering a shot, it goes safely through to the keeper
good delivery to end the over, on offstump, Sarwan gets on the front foot and opens the face, only getting it as far as backward point
overpitched delivery on the legstump, Morton nearly falls over as he works that one towards square leg
nice tight line from Ishant, just outside off, Sarwan defends it towards point
back of a length from Ishant, again cramping Sarwan for room, the batsman defends it towards cover
on middle and leg, easy run for Sarwan after he wrists it beind square leg
a bit wide outside off, Morton bends his knees as he glides that towards third man for another single

an uncharacteristic shot from Sarwan to end the over, short and well outside off, Sarwan wanted to hook that to midwicket, it goes through to the keeper, there's a faint noise as it passes the batsman, the Indians are confident they've got Sarwan, but umpire rules it not out, hard to tell from the replays whether it hit the bat or not
fullish ball on the pads, played towards midwicket by Morton who wants a single but is sent back by Sarwan
extra bounce for Nehra, beats the batsman who was trying to cut a delivery from middle stump, doesn't connect and it sails to the keeper
a bit fuller from Nehra, this time Mortin connects with the cut and gets it away towards point
Morton goes for an extravagant pull to a shortish ball, gets a thick bottom edge onto his pads, the ball dribbles down the pitch
sharp movement into the batsman after pitching on off, Morton looks to defend off the front foot, another inside-edge onto the pads, this is good stuff from Nehra
similar length from Nehra, again the ball jags into the batsman, who adjusts late to defend it towards mid-off
full and on the pads, Sarwan misses out on that one, looked to swing it down to fine leg, hits him on the pads outside legstump and rolls away towards Dhoni
short and wide from Ishant, Morton crashes it towards third man, who had to cover some ground to his right to cit it off, gives the batsmen time to get a couple
short and outside off again, Morton looks to pull but slices it towards mid-on, nearly caught there, Yuvraj puts in a dive but can't reach it
full and on the pads, Morton turns it towards midwicket

good-looking shot from Sarwan, the ball was on a length just outside off, he stepped into a cover drive, placement was perfect, between cover and extra cover, it's a damp outfield which keeps the ball from reaching the boundary, the batsmen take three though
Morton looks to hammer this short one over the leg side, horribly mistimed, the ball dribbles back towards the bowler
Sarwan looks to repeat that eye-catching cover drive of his, gets a bit of an outside edge this time, so it doesn't go as far as the previous one, the batsmen sprint through for two
fullish ball on the pads, Sarwan nudges it towards square leg
back to offstump line from Nehra, Sarwan wanted to crash that through cover, doesn't quite get hold of it, and it rolls towards point
good delivery from Nehra, but it's a no-ball, back of a length moving into Sarwan, who gets a bottom-edge on it
